voice.text: Passages to Thais, Carlin, Ab'Dendriel, Port Hope, Edron, Darashia, Liberty Bay, Svargrond, Gray Island, Yalahar and Ankrahmun.

parameter.value: Good bye. Recommend us if you were satisfied with our service.
Good bye. Recommend us if you were satisfied with our service.
My name is Captain Fearless from the Royal Tibia Line.
This is Venore. Where do you want to go?
Welcome on board, |PLAYERNAME|. Where may I {sail} you today?
